title: Is Salatul Ishraq supposed to be prayed at home or in the masjid? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: jummah says is salatul ishraq supposed to be prayed at home or at the masjid it can be prayed at home but the reward of a full perfect umrah and hajj would not be awarded this award is only given to those who pray fajr in the masjid in congregation wait until the sun rises and then pray two raka's but those who pray home can do the same will be highly rewarded but not in the same fashion allah knows best
